points.text: Created and deployed a GraphQL API using Java, Spring Boot, and PostgreSQL
Used GitHub Actions to set up automated CI/CD workflows.
Used Angular and SCSS to create and update front-end components, adhering to strict styling standards.
Used C# and .NET Core to create API endpoints, unit tests, component tests, and integration tests.
Used Oracle PL/SQL to create Data Reports and Extracts
Developed a web application for the analysis and presentation of experimental SAS data
Achieved 100X faster compute time of select elements
Using Flask, Bootstrap, NumPy, SciPy, and Matplotlib
Responsible for lab instruction, marking, and holding office hours for 4 core undergraduate courses
Built and deployed a web application that grades assignments
